package.name: Ferratum_Ferbuy
package.summary: FerBuy "Buy now, Pay later" extension for Magento 1.5 and higher
package.description: FerBuy is a simple and safe payment solution based on the "buy now, pay later" concept. Through FerBuy you can shop from home and pay after delivery. This gives your customers the chance to see the product before they have to pay for it.
package.notes: FerBuy is now active in Bulgaria! Visit www.ferbuy.bg for more information.
